name: Brrrainz: Feed your Hunger
description: An adventure strategy game with some RPG elements. Explore the vast territories of 1960s America, survive in a hostile world, improve your skills, loot, use tactics, and manage your horde in the wacky world of Brrrainz.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E8400, 3.0GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6000+, 3.0GHz or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce 9600 GT or AMD HD 3870 512MB or higher Storage: 2 GB available space
